lead_paragraph: Despite losing Chris Paul to a hamstring injury, the Los Angeles Clippers beat the San Antonio Spurs 106-101 at Staples Center on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Clippers Battle Past Spurs Despite Paul Injury
headline.main: Clippers Battle Past Spurs Despite Paul Injury

snippet: Despite losing Chris Paul to a hamstring injury, the Los Angeles Clippers beat the San Antonio Spurs 106-101 at Staples Center on Thursday....
